definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: Once Synechococcus spp. forms bloom, its influence will be far-reaching to whole ecosystem.
sentences.chinese: 一旦形成赤潮，对整个生态系统的影响将非常深远。

sentences.english: Project-based ecosystem services accounting has its limitations, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而作为项目基础的生态系统服务会计有其局限性。

sentences.english: With the above approach, methodologies for assessing the healthiness of coastal zone ecosystem are studies in this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 初步探讨了海岸带生态系统健康评价方法。

sentences.english: The profits there are in premium products, buoyed by the seamless ecosystem.
sentences.chinese: 他们在高端产品的利润，依靠着无缝的生态系统。

sentences.english: Dynamics of ecosystem science. Requires paid subscription.
sentences.chinese: 描述生态系统的刊物，需要预付定金。

sentences.english: Scientists have found life in an ecosystem trapped underneath a glacier in Antarctica for nearly 2 million years.
sentences.chinese: 万年之久的一个生态系统中，科学家们发现了生命。

sentences.english: The industrial catenary after reframing perhaps says ecosystem, who can become chain advocate?
sentences.chinese: 重构之后的产业链或者说生态系统，谁会成为链主？

sentences.english: The research of sulphur balance in agro-ecosystem was reviewed with special regard to the input to groundwater.
sentences.chinese: 论述考虑地下水中硫投入的农田生态系统中硫的平衡。

sentences.english: It's an organic flow of giving and receiving that entire eco-systems are based on.
sentences.chinese: 整个生态系统是基于付出与回报的有机的循环。

sentences.english: So again, they’re basically trying to recreate the ecosystem that Apple has.
sentences.chinese: 所以有一次，他们试图重新建立苹果拥有的生态系统。

sentences.english: Ecosystem made of Picea mongolica is a special sandy forest ecosystem in China.
sentences.chinese: 沙地云杉林是陆地上非常特殊的森林生态系统类型。

sentences.english: Mulberry-silkworm ecosystem is one of the important agro-ecosystems in China.
sentences.chinese: 蚕桑生态系统是我国农业生态系统的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Mulberry-silkworm ecosystem is one of the important agro-ecosystems in China.
sentences.chinese: 蚕桑生态系统是我国农业生态系统的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Eutrophication is the main factor for the degradation of lake ecosystem.
sentences.chinese: 富营养化是导致湖泊生态系统退化的主要因素。

sentences.english: Therefore, the research about carbon cycle of terrestrial eco-system is profound.
sentences.chinese: 因而展开陆地生态系统内的碳循环研究意义重大。

sentences.english: Ulmus pumila open forest ecosystem plays an important role in Otindag Sandy Land.
sentences.chinese: 榆树疏林生态系统是浑善达克沙地的重要组分之一。

definition: industry chain (concept proposed by US scholar Michael Porter in 1985)
